ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or do you see how he has denied and turned away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have you thought that if he denies and turns away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did you consider: what if he gives the lie (to the Truth) and turns away (from it)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: What will happen if the prohibiting rejects the Truth and turns away from it!?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What is your opinion – if he denies and turns away, how wretched will be his state!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Have you seen if he denies and turns away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have you considered if he gives the lie to the truth and turns (his) back?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What thinkest thou? If he cries lies, and turns away -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hast thou seen if he denieth (Allah's guidance) and is froward?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you see how he has denied the truth and turned away from it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Bethinkest thou, if he belieth and turneth away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: tell me, should he call him a liar and turn away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Seest thou if he denies (Truth) and turns away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Tell me if he (the disbeliever, Abu Jahl) denies (the truth, i.e. this Quran), and turns away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What do you think? Have you seen if he belies and turns away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do you see how he disbelieved and turned away?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [96:13] Have you considered what if he, the one forbidding the Prophet, should be denying [God’s guidance] and turning away?, from faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Hast thou seen if he denieth (Allah's guidance)) and Abu Jahl disbelieved in Allah's divine Oneness (and is froward) and turned away from faith?
